abstracts.cdata!:
Long-term credit would be provided: (i)
            to approximately 4,300 small farmers and ranchers who,
            either individually or as members of cooperatives, farm 12
            basic ha of land or less. At least twenty percent of project
            funds would be earmarked for the use of approximately 2,500
            minifundistas owning only five basic ha of land or less;
            (ii) to an estimated 500 medium-sized farmers and ranchers;
            and (iii) to some 80 agro-industries. The long-term credit
            provided under the project would finance on-farm
            improvements in the fruits, vineyards, beef, sheep and diary
            products fields as well as the installation, modernization
            or expansion of related agro-industrial facilities.
